entry.title: $1875 // 4 bedroom 2 bth Great Schools Williamsburg superb ranch style home Gre
entry.content: Fabulous 3 bedroom, 2 home with split bedrooms to get built. Nation front porch, entry lobby, formal eating room with tray threshold, spacious Superb room has double holder ceiling. Hardwood flooring in the foyer, dining and superb rooms. The kitchen contains a breakfast space, breakfast table, pantry cabinet, cabinets with molding and knobs, stainless appliances. Personal Master bedroom retreat is definitely 17 by 14 and has a dish ceiling, walk in closet, garden tub, individual walk in shower room and pride with two sinks. Laundry room contains a linen closet. Large protected rear veranda and an outdoor. Side access 23 times 22 completed and painted garage with automatic door opener and pull down stairs to attic storage space above. Increased slab, landscaped yard. Smooth ceilings, RB3 window and door terme conseill?, style interior door, five 1/4 baseboards. Low maintenance energy efficient home. Close to downtown Riverwalk Park, great cusine and searching, just 25 minutes towards the and Myrtle. Square footage is usually approximate but not guaranteed. Client is responsible for confirmation.. Flatlands Crown Heights Bensonhurst
